Using a Financial Calculator
It is very important that you be able to use a financial calculator when working TVM
problems because the exam is constructed under the assumption that candidates have
the ability to do so. There is simply no other way that you will have time to solve TVM
problems. CFA Institute allows only two types of calculators to be used for the exam—the TI
